titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: SKIN TO SKIN CONTACT INDICATOR (WITHIN ONE HOUR) - Description

div.p: SKIN TO SKIN CONTACT INDICATOR (WITHIN ONE HOUR) is the same as attribute SKIN TO SKIN CONTACT INDICATOR.
SKIN TO SKIN CONTACT INDICATOR (WITHIN ONE HOUR) is where skin to skin contact was made between mother and baby following Labour and Delivery, within one hour of Delivery of the baby.
